text:
A Good Death [30 May - 5 June]
.
Faith Ng’s play asks us to consider a difficult question: what does it mean to have a good death?
.
Poignant and insightful, A Good Death is a tender meditation on what it means to lean on one another, even on those you least expect.
.
Hurry, watch it before 5 JUNE! Details at https://www.apart.sg/featured-season-8/thestudios-agooddeath
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason8 | @esplanadethestudios
